title: Mysterious Love - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Drama   Age Progression   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Soldiers
author: Ni Shui Qian Liu   弱水千流
description:
Li Teng has served in the 'Falcon' for more than ten years.

He is ruthless and unruly, and everyone in the entire airborne brigade knows it.

The brothers are very curious, what kind of lady their boss is looking for in the future.

Until a little cutie appeared.

She is charming, gentle and silly.

One smile, and Li Teng's life was hers.>
